column1: Smoque BBQ////inflationary society----prices especially given the high and consistent quality and the quantity.  Their ownership/management understand that one needs all components clicking to make a great dining experience.  How they continue and consistently do this---especially given the nonsensical employee situations I find elsewhere----is amazing.  Easy to get in and out of.  And
column3: excellent location when you consider they are literally at the convergence of two major expressways
column4: CTA bus and rapid transit lines
column5: and commuter services.  Do not complain about a limited menu
column6: they serve it right or not at all.
